title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-10.5 - Telephone hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-10.5 - Telephone hearings

State Regulations

Fair hearings may be conducted by telephone, pursuant
to section
358-5.12
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
398-10.5

Adopted by

New

York State Register September 24, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 38, eff. 10/1/2014. Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
